Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.gameEntity.common_cards

Class CommonGoalCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.gameEntity.common_cards.CommonGoalCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommonCard1, CommonCard10, CommonCard11, CommonCard12, CommonCard2, CommonCard3, CommonCard4, CommonCard5, CommonCard6, CommonCard7, CommonCard8, CommonCard9
public abstract class CommonGoalCard extends Object implements Serializable
This abstract class is the superclass of the commonGoalCards.

      Returns:
